Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 68th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/1/2015...
Had first career hit on 5/26/2015, off Alberto Arroyo (KC)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/29/2015 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/8/2017 to a 4-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago to Atlanta on 3/2/2019 (Going to CHI: P Jim Palmer Jr.. Going to ATL: RF Antony Stedman, P Henry Lee, P Roberto Ortiz)...
Traded from Atlanta to St. Louis (C) on 6/15/2019 (Going to ATL: P Paul Barbagallo, P Robert Wilcoxson, 2B Michael Holgate. Going to STL: P Henry Lee, CF Kenneth Parkerson)...
